I'd highly recommend watching "Smilla's Sense of Snow" starring Julia Ormond. This thrilling mystery film follows Smilla, a half Inuit woman, who investigates the mysterious death of a young Inuit boy in Copenhagen, leading her on an intriguing journey to Greenland.

Another fascinating movie is "La fiesta del chivo" starring Isabella Rossellini. This film delves into the life and times of Rafael Trujillo, the Dominican dictator, through the eyes of a woman who returns to Santo Domingo after many years. Both movies offer captivating stories and compelling performances. Enjoy!
